name: Wondercade Arcade
description:
Take on the role of a young arcade manager to bring his/her grandfarther's old arcade back to its former glory. Satisfy your customer's needs with affordable arcade machines and snacks to make money. Manage your arcade well and you'll become a thriving business in no time, or if you need a break why not play some arcade games? Play at your own pace.

Designers:

- Adam Klappers

- James Cummins

Artists: 

- Nghia Do

- Charlie Ferwerda

- Jaedan Kennaway

- Matthew Hall

Programmers:

-  James Brown

- Jack Sinko

This is a student project that we worked hard on for the past 16 weeks, please enjoy.
